name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flowtide Read Later - Save Articles for Later

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flowtide Read Later is a bookmarks-based read later extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flowtide Read Later is a bookmarks-based read later extension. It allows you to save articles for later reading and access them in a neat interface. It is a simple extension that allows you to keep full ownership of your articles.
